title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Davante Adams to Raiders Reaction, Baker Trade Demand Drama, GM Belichick Second Guessing with Mike Silver
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Davante Adams to Raiders Reaction, Baker Trade Demand Drama, GM Belichick Second Guessing with Mike Silver
description:
First, in Fake Questions, Real Answers (3:00), Colin reacts to the Packers trading All-Pro Davante Adams to the Raiders for picks, and how Aaron Rodgers new deal sealed Adams fate in Green Bay. He also explains why it was easy to see early on that Baker Mayfield wasn't a franchise quarterback, what's behind the flood of big name talent to L.A. teams, and his March Madness prediction that's already panned out.

Then, longtime NFL writer Mike Silver joins Colin to Baker Mayfield's trade demand (19:00), the leaked comments by the Browns bashing Baker, if Aaron Rodgers knew his massive would make it impossible to keep Davante Adams in Green Bay (28:00), if Rodgers can work with an inexperienced receiving corps (41:00), and what's behind Bill Belichick letting valuable players - like JC Jackson and Shaq Mason - walk (47:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
